com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core

Class SceneObjectManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.silvergobletgames.sylver.core.SceneObjectManager

  • public class SceneObjectManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the SceneObjects that are in the current Scene.
